# audioTimePitchAlgorithm

**Instance Property**

A processing algorithm for managing audio pitch for scaled audio edits.

## Declaration

```swift
var audioTimePitchAlgorithm: AVAudioTimePitchAlgorithm { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAudioTimePitchAlgorithm/spectral].

## Configuring audio output

- **audioMix**: The parameters for audio mixing and an indication of whether to enable nondefault audio mixing for export.
